item.description:
Come celebrate Earth Day with fellow friends and family!! Both the 5k/10k will start at 10am and finish at Lynch Park.

We have partnered with the BNS Fitness Race Directors and will have a tent and a presence at this event. If you are interested in hanging out and helping at the tent and clininc, please email me at: barefootrunners@yahoo.com

There will also be a free barefoot clinic after the 10K race so plan to stay later and get that information you have been looking for to understand more about barefoot running.

For more information, please see link below:

http://www.bnseventmanagement.com/events/EnergizeEarth.html
item.name: Energize The Earth 5k, 10k and Free Barefoot Clinic, Beverly MA
